} if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 3) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by terminate } String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 2994; c.teleportToY = 3365; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!"); c.sendMessage("An owner will release you if he/she feel like it!"); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2009, 11:23:23 am[/size][hr]is that a good code?

item.title: Omfg i need some more help :)
item.dc:creator: @pkpoison pkpoison
item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

well im not going to spoonfeed you but here is one code im not sure if this will work so backup the file… replace your jail code with this… [code] }
if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
					p.toY = 3285;
					//p.action = 1;
                    p.sM("You have been jailed by " + playerName);
					yell(" "+playerName+" has jailed "+p.playerName+" ");
					sM("You have jailed "+p.playerName+".");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }
        }[/code]

item.title: Omfg i need some more help :)
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

help with alot of the stuff i need help with…

  1. in GUI.java or something to make th thing my where and what do i paste my IP instead of him and where do i find my IP?

  2. how to make minigames like pc, assault and custom minigames?

  3. how to recolor items i know how but what is the color numbers?

  4. my jail doesnt work when i jail other the game freeze here is my jail command

if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 3) {
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); //made by mod allstar
}
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 2994;
c.teleportToY = 3365;
c.teleblock = true;
c.sendMessage(“You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!”);
c.sendMessage(“A staff will release you if he/she feel like it!”);
c.teleblock = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

  1. how to make drop commands, item commands like ::gilded and u get gilded and tele commands?

  2. how to fix the backround on the client and the name and the options like music tab and files?

  3. how to add my own objekts and npc’s custom?

  4. i need help with animations. i need to know where i can find the weapon anim nad where to paste it for me to see the wep when i hit?

  5. how to get the server online by hamachi or no-ip explain please how to use it…

  6. can someone make me rainbow and crystal whip?

  7. how to change the hp bar from pokemon to old or new one?

  8. i cant kill npc’s when i kill them they got dobble of the hp they really have and so on.

  9. i have searched but i cant find them all but i need a ::hp commands for admin+ which make them have 1m hp and if they log out they got 99 or whateva the lvl is

  10. how to get teletabs into emote tab

  11. how to change the spells and teles in the mage book

  12. how to add tele tabs like when i type ::teleports it shows up a list u can click where u are going and u tele there and the tab close down?

  13. how to add on pickup i got alot of 10000 - 20000 but how to do so i can type ::pickup 995 1 and get one coin and still can type ::pickup 13363 and get bandos whip like on pickuppk V.2

  14. just an idea can someone make me command named x-jail its like normal jail just u go free but u cant talk, u can see other but they cant see u, u cant trade, u cant pickup items or tele?

  15. i have a 508 server but i cant play on it how to get it so i can play it starts normaly but the client wont open the loading just stops

  16. how to get the login name only 12 charcters and pass 14?
    thx i need help with alot but when i know all theese things i can finaly play my server
    remember to numberize the questions ur answering on thx
    and epic ancient i wanna steal your idea is it alright? the idea of copy the text with answers somehow and paste it on new at the help section and put a strikeout over the questions i have finished on my server[

Read full topic
